::Zardus/DevilDuer::

(UnderT, I have no problems with Wolfgang thinking he is a co-leader. Zardus 
just doesn't think so. There's nothing personal behind it.)

Zardus is walking toward the torture chamber when he hears Nemesis' 
transmission. "Ah. Yes.... Can you please drag him to the torture chamber?" 
He replies, "I'll send Devil to help you."

Zardus switches over to DevilDuer's frequency, "Devil, go assist Nemesis in 
the CR chambers. He'll tell you what to do."

"On my way," DevilDuer replies and walks off toward the CR chambers.

Zardus enters the torture chambers.

"Energon beams activate," He says into his wrist. Energon beams bind Wolfgang.

"I would apreciate it if you wouldn't mode," He says, "Now whould you care to 
explain your actions?...."
